price: Oni sumnjaju da će pred Gospodara svoga stati, a On, zaista, obuhvata sve.
arabic: أَلَآ إِنَّهُمۡ فِي مِرۡيَةٖ مِّن لِّقَآءِ رَبِّهِمۡۗ أَلَآ إِنَّهُۥ بِكُلِّ شَيۡءٖ مُّحِيطُۢ

version.title: Bosnian translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Bosnian by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: alā innahum fī mir'yatin min liqāi rabbihim alā innahu bikulli shayin muḥīṭun
